title: Epsilon.Day1.Evening.Start
body:
Day one, but its nite
<<if $escape_active is true>>
[[I'm trying to escape, wanna join in?|Epsilon.EscapeOption]]
<<endif>>
[[Nevermind|Epsilon.EndDialog]]

title: Epsilon.Day2.Morning.Start
body: Good morning? What's good about it?

title: Epsilon.Day2.Evening.Start
body:
It sure is night again huh
<<if $escape_active is true>>
[[I'm trying to escape, wanna join in?|Epsilon.EscapeOption]]
<<endif>>
[[Nevermind|Epsilon.EndDialog]]

title: Epsilon.Day3.Morning.Start
body:
Every day I wake up in this place and I know there's no escape. 
I have dreams where I'm trapped in a well and I can't get out, I claw at the walls
to try and get out but, well... I never do.
And then I wake up here

title: Epsilon.Day3.Evening.Start
body:
I'm going to have that same dream again tonight, I can almost feel it
<<if $escape_active is true>>
[[I'm trying to escape, wanna join in?|Epsilon.EscapeOption]]
<<endif>>
[[Nevermind|Epsilon.EndDialog]]

title: Epsilon.EscapeOption
body:
<<addNPCToEscape CampAreaSecretEscape Epsilon>>
Oh yeah, lets get out of here
